template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Хтось має питання про ваш список
template.s_description:
Привіт {CONTACT_NAME}!

{USER_NAME} ({USER_EMAIL}, {USER_PHONE}) залишив вам повідомлення про ваш список {ITEM_TITLE}:

{COMMENT}

Збачення,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: Будь ласка, підтвердіть ваш обліковий запис на {WEB_TITLE}
template.s_description:
Привіт {USER_NAME},

Будь ласка, підтвердіть вашу реєстрацію, натиснувши на наступне посилання: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Дякуємо!

Відгуки

,

{WEB_LINK}

Привіт, {USER_NAME},

Ви успішно зареєструвалися за {WEB_LINK}.

Дякуємо!

Згода,

{WEB_LINK}

Привіт {FRIEND_NAME},

Ваш друг {USER_NAME} хоче поділитися цим списком з вами {ITEM_TITLE}.

Повідомлення:

{COMMENT}

Коресування,

{WEB_TITLE}

Hi {USER_NAME},

New listings have been published in the last hour. Take a look at them:

{ADS}

-------------

To unsubscribe from this alert, click on: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

New listings have been published in the last day. Take a look at them:

{ADS}

-------------

To unsubscribe from this alert, click on: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

New listings have been published in the last week. Take a look at them:

{ADS}

-------------

To unsubscribe from this alert, click on: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

A new listing has been published, check it out!

{ADS}

-------------

To unsubscribe from this alert, click on: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

Someone commented on the listing {ITEM_TITLE}.

Commenter: {COMMENT_AUTHOR}
Commenter's email: {COMMENT_EMAIL}
Title: {COMMENT_TITLE}
Comment: {COMMENT_TEXT}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're not registered at {WEB_LINK}, but you can still edit or delete the listing {ITEM_TITLE} for a short period of time.

You can edit your listing by following this link: {EDIT_LINK}

You can delete your listing by following this link: {DELETE_LINK}

If you register as a user, you will have full access to editing options.

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're receiving this e-mail because a listing has been published at {WEB_LINK}. Please validate this listing by clicking on the following link: {VALIDATION_LINK}. If you didn't publish this listing, please ignore this email.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact e-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Dear {WEB_TITLE} admin,

You're receiving this email because a listing has been published at {WEB_LINK}.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact email: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

You can edit this listing by clicking on the following link: {EDIT_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Привіт {USER_NAME},

Ми надіслали вам цю електронну пошту, оскільки ви подали запит на нагадування про пароль. Перейдіть за цим посиланням, щоб відновити його: {PASSWORD_LINK}

Посилання буде відключено через 24 години.

Якщо ви не запитували нагадування паролю, будь ласка, проігноруйте це повідомлення. Цей запит був зроблений з IP {IP_ADDRESS} на {DATE_TIME}

Здання,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME}

You're receiving this e-mail because you requested an e-mail change. Please confirm this new e-mail address by clicking on the following validation link: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

Please validate your alert registration by clicking on the following link: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Thank you!

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Привіт {COMMENT_AUTHOR},

Ваш коментар на {ITEM_TITLE} було затверджено.

Згоди,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're receiving this e-mail because you\’ve published a listing at {WEB_LINK}. Please validate this listing by clicking on the following link: {VALIDATION_LINK}. If you didn't publish this listing, please ignore this e-mail.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact e-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

Even if you're not registered at {WEB_LINK}, you can still edit or delete your listing:

You can edit your listing by following this link: {EDIT_LINK}

You can delete your listing by following this link: {DELETE_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Dear {WEB_TITLE} admin,

You're receiving this email because a new user has been created at {WEB_LINK}.

User details:

Name: {USER_NAME}
E-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Привіт {CONTACT_NAME}!

{USER_NAME} ({USER_EMAIL}, {USER_PHONE}) залишило вам повідомлення:

{COMMENT}

Повстання,

{WEB_LINK}

There's a new comment on the listing: {ITEM_TITLE}.

Author: {COMMENT_AUTHOR}
Author's email: {COMMENT_EMAIL}
Title: {COMMENT_TITLE}
Comment: {COMMENT_TEXT}

{WEB_LINK}

Привіт {ADMIN_NAME},

Адміністратор {WEB_LINK} створив обліковий запис для вас,

  • Ім'я користувача: {USERNAME}
  • Пароль: {PASSWORD}

Ви можете отримати доступ до панелі адміністратора тут {WEB_ADMIN_LINK}.

Дякую!

Незалежно від того,

Привіт, {USER_NAME},

Ваш список {ITEM_TITLE} закінчується {WEB_LINK}.
